mads:mads.mads:note: The works of C. Memmius L.f. [CF] 1991: PHI CD ROM #5.3, Latin Canon, bibliographic screen (C. Memmius L.F.)
Malcovati, E. Oratorum romanorum fragmenta liberae rei publicae, 1955: p. 401 (C. Memmius; tribune, 66 B.C.; aedilis, 63 B.C.; praetor, 58 B.C.; appears to have died before 46 B.C.)

Oxford class. dict., 1st ed.: p. 555 (Memmius, Gaius; husband of Sulla's daughter Fausta Cornelia; praetor, 58 B.C.; hostile to Caesar; propraetor in Bithynia, 57 B.C.; divorced Fausta and supported Caesar, 55 B.C.; exiled 53 B.C. and returned to Rome 49 B.C.)
